title: FS: NEW Large Lot of 70 Low Grade T206 **ALL CARDS $13 EACH**

posts.post_title: FS: NEW Large Lot of 70 Low Grade T206 **ALL CARDS $13 EACH**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale or trade. These are all low grade cards as the scans will show. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

**ALL CARDS ARE $13 EACH**

**ALL CARDS SOLD...THANKS!**
One weekend bump on the remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
